long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aigis Helper alpha release. Translates some of Aigis into English.

After installing, you'll need to set a translation file. Go into the options and paste this into the text box:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kkentauro/aigishelper-strings/master/strings.zip
Then click Save, and the extension should be ready to use.

Currently not working with Aigis C. Please use Aigis R.
